name: The Archfey
description: You have made a pact with a powerful fey being, gaining beguiling magic and trickery.

1.name: Fey Presence
1.description: You can charm or frighten creatures in a cube around you.

1.name: Expanded Spell List
1.description: The Archfey lets you choose from an expanded list of spells.

6.name: Misty Escape
6.description: You can turn invisible and teleport when you take damage.

10.name: Beguiling Defenses
10.description: You are immune to being charmed and can reflect charm effects.

14.name: Dark Delirium
14.description: You banish a creature into a fey illusion realm.
